```{r}
#Libraries
library(pwr)
```

```{r}
pwr.f2.test(u = 4, f2 = .20, sig.level = .05, power = .80)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, f2 = .15, sig.level = .05, power = .80)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, f2 = .35, sig.level = .05, power = .80)
```

```{r}
pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, f2 = .02, sig.level = .05)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, f2 = .20, sig.level = .05)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, f2 = .35, sig.level = .05)
```

```{r}
pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, sig.level = .05, power = .80)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, sig.level = .05, power = .80)

pwr.f2.test(u = 4, v = 62, sig.level = .05, power = .80)
```
